Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A wonderful house. Especially when you
consider that it's the first one you've
ever built!
<PAGE>
I think you've got real potential,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right, next thing. Let me give you the 
<GREEN>furniture blueprints</GREEN>, for all this
stuff, and the <GREEN>refrigerator blueprints</GREEN>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll explain about furniture now, too.
Listen carefully as you'll be using this
stuff every day from now on!
